Record Class GameEvent.PlayerAction

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.events.GameEvent.PlayerAction
Record Components:
playerId - The actor.
actionType - The type of action (e.g., "RAISE", "FOLD").
amount - The amount involved (e.g., bet size), or 0 if not applicable.
message - Additional description or chat message.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEvent
Enclosing interface:
GameEvent
public static record GameEvent.PlayerAction(String playerId, String actionType, int amount, String message) extends Record implements GameEvent
Triggered when a player performs a visible action (e.g., Bet, Fold).

      public final boolean equals(Object o)

Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object); primitive components are compared with the compare method from their corresponding wrapper classes.
